1.7.0.2.name: connect20/Advaanz_Salesforce
1.7.0.2.description: This extension is used for migrate the all products of Magento which are in product admin grid to saleforce product module. What ever the products you want to migrate from magento to salesforce select the products then it will save the products data in salesorce.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
